name: Expert Water
overview:
Established in the year 2010, we, “Expert Water Solution Private Limited”, are an ISO 9001:2008 certified involved in manufacturing, supplying, wholesaling, distribution and exporting RO Membranes, Pumps and Spares. Our offered products are manufactured under the supervision of professionals, who make utilization of advanced technologies. Our range of RO spares are appreciated in the market for their specific designs, durability and easy installation.

Our Aim: “Our aim is to be the top residential/industrial water purifier assembly house in domestic and global market”.

Our Future Plans: We are aiming towards penetrating in the domestic arena. Though people in urban areas are becoming aware of the quality of drinking water, still the growth of awareness is very low. This growth is much lower in the rural areas, as a result of which, various types of diseases are occurring in villages. Our organization is hoping to capture this market which has a vast untapped potential.

Our Team: Engineers Quality analyzers Skilled & semi-skilled laborers Warehousing & packaging experts Sales and marketing personnel Procuring agents

Our Infrastructure: In order to meet the growing needs of various industries, we have constructed a sound infrastructure facility. The infrastructure of our firm spreads over a vast area of land due to which we are able to execute all the tasks in a systematic manner.

Quality Assurance: Since commencement, we pay high priority towards the quality of offered products. The offered products are designed and developed under the supervision of professionals using high-grade component and raw material in compliance with the industry standards.
